title: Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan min chawlhtir la
lyrics:
Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan min chawlhtir la,
Chutah Chhandamtu thisen a chhuak ta;
Nunna tui chutah a luang,
Mi sual faina a ni ang;
Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan min chawlhtir la.

Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan kei ka chawl ang,
Chu hmun chu thlarau hlimna ber a ni;
Tunah ka hlim em em ta,
Min chhandam tawh avangin,
Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan kei ka chawl ang.

Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan min chentir la,
Pathian duhzawng chutah chauh ka thei ang;
Mi tak tak lo ni tura
A duhzawng ka tih theih nan
Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan min chentir la.

Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan min chawlhtir la,
Isua thisen a chhuahna hnuaiah khan;
A kephah vuanin chutah,
Nilenga ka hlim theih nan,
Kraws daihlim hnuaiah chuan min chawlhtir la.
